title: Elly Schlein - Wikipedia
snippet: Elena Ethel "Elly" Schlein (Italian: [ˈɛlli ˈʃlain]; born 4 May 1985) is an Italian politician who has been serving as the secretary of the Democratic Party (PD) since 12 March 2023. She is a member of Italy's Chamber of Deputies and was previously the vice president of Emilia-Romagna and ...

title: Elly Schlein Biography: Age, Net Worth, Career - Mabumbe
snippet: Elly Schlein burst onto Italy’s political scene as a fresh voice challenging the status quo, becoming the first woman and openly LGBTQ+ leader of the Democratic Party (PD) in 2023.

title: Italy's left picks 'anti-Meloni' politician Elly Schlein to lead the party | Euronews
snippet: After cutting her political teeth across the Atlantic, Schlein became an impassioned youth activist for the Democratic Party and was elected as a member of the European Parliament in 2014.
